section.programlisting: 457 { 458 vec2 v1 = {1.0f, 0.0f}; 459 460 GLM(vec2_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, v1); 461 462 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 463 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 1.0f)) 464 465 GLM(vec2_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, v1); 466 467 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], -1.0f)) 468 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 469 470 GLM(vec2_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, v1); 471 472 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 473 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], -1.0f)) 474 475 GLM(vec2_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, v1); 476 477 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 1.0f)) 478 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 479 480 TEST_SUCCESS 481 }
